title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python library for downloading, running, and managing local large language models (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete, copy, show, create, and embed endpoints.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; same capabilities as ollama-js plus streaming and async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLM and ChatModel components for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model management, multi-user, RAG, voice input, themes).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama exposing all REST endpoints with sync/async helpers and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper adding batch scripts, model aliases, and YAML config for power users.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into inline suggestions and chat sidebar like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG pipeline combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain for PDF question-answering.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that lets users chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-nodered
summary: Node-RED nodes to call Ollama generate/chat/embed endpoints in low-code IoT workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async I/O, streaming, and dependency-injection helpers for ASP.NET Core.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by any Ollama model for note-taking help.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot using Bolt framework to expose Ollama chat/generate endpoints as Slack slash commands with thread support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app providing Ollama client, admin UI, and REST endpoints for model management and chat.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama in OTP style with GenServer and streaming support for Phoenix LiveView demos.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama with cross-compilation support and async HTTP for native desktop apps.
